LanguageData.configRuleAdesc: Rule A: \nIf the Player researched all techs of the techlevel X and below, the techlevel rises to X +

LanguageData.configCheckboxNeedTechColonists: If this option is enabled then you won't be able to advance your techlevel \nbeyond '{0}' if you only have tribal members in your colony/tribe.
LanguageData.configCheckboxNeedTechColonists_CappedAt: As a result your techlevel is capped at '{0}' until your colony/tribe gains a non-tribal person.
LanguageData.configCheckboxDisableCostMultiplicatorCa: Remove the vanilla limit of 200% for the research project speed penalty calculation. (like in A18 and before).
